Manage student fee collection, receipts, refunds, and maintain fee registers. Prepare monthly and annual financial statements for the school management. Handle salary processing, allowances, and other payments for teachers and staff. Manage accounts payable and receivable, including vendor and utility payments. Prepare budgets and monitor expenses to ensure proper use of school funds. Reconcile bank statements and maintain cash and bank balances. Ensure compliance with school policies and relevant financial regulations. Assist in internal and external audits by providing necessary financial documents. Maintain confidentiality and transparency in all financial matters. Operate & manage the school‚Äôs bank accounts in accordance with approved authority prepare and process cheques, online transfers, and other bank payments. Assist in opening, closing or updating bank accounts as per management approval. Maintain proper records of bank transactions and supporting documents. Perform regular bank reconciliation and resolve any discrepancies. Managed distribution of payments/dividends among investors as per approved ratios. Ensured accurate and timely allocation of payments to investors. Prepare and processed investor payment distributions with proper documentation. job_title: Content Strategist / Creative Lead / Head of Content (Digital Marketing)
job_description: Content Strategist / Creative Lead / Head of Content (Digital Marketing) : Hena International Ltd. Jobs ENG ‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶Ç‡¶≤‡¶æ Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Hena International Ltd. Content Strategist / Creative Lead / Head of Content (Digital Marketing) Application Deadline : 10 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 5 Location: Bangladesh, Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Experience: At least 4 years Published: 28 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Bachelor/Honors Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Marketing, Media, Communication, or related field (preferred) Experience At least 4 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Advertising Agency, Advertising Technology (AdTech) Startup, E-commerce, Film Production, Market Research Firms, Satellite TV, Software Company Additional Requirements Strong storytelling and creative writing skills. Hands-on experience with digital content creation tools (Canva, Photoshop, Illustrator, video editing tools). Knowledge of social media trends, SEO, and paid advertising campaigns. Leadership , team management, and coordination skills. Analytical mindset to evaluate content performance. Must be able to work from office in Dhaka. Responsibilities & Context Job Context We are seeking a creative and strategic Content Strategist / Content Planner / Creative Lead / Head of Content / Content Marketing Strategist to join our digital marketing team. In our small team, you will handle planning and executing content strategies, supervise content production across all channels (image, video, text), ensure brand consistency across campaigns, and provide team guidance‚Äîall in one role. Requirements 4/5 years of experience in content strategy, content planning, creative leadership, or agency content roles Ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines efficiently Strong understanding of copywriting, video editing, and graphic design processes Experience in digital media, content marketing, and digital advertising Key Responsibilities Develop content strategies aligned with client goals and business objectives. Lead and guide a team of content creators, designers, and video editors to execute tasks effectively. Create and maintain content plans, schedules, and campaign structures. Plan and oversee the production of social media, advertising, and website content. Generate, review, and refine creative ideas and concepts. Maintain consistent brand voice, tone, and style across all channels. Conduct market research , competitor analysis, and audience insights. Analyze content performance and optimize campaigns for engagement and conversions. Collaborate with Digital Marketing Strategists, Performance Teams, and Client Managers. Generate creative ideas for campaigns, video scripts, ad copy, and social media posts. Ensure content i

job_title: Sales Closer / Deal Closer / Sales Specialist / Lead Conversion Specialist (Digital Marketing)
job_description: Sales Closer / Deal Closer / Sales Specialist / Lead Conversion Specialist (Digital Marketing) : Hena International Ltd. Jobs ENG ‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶Ç‡¶≤‡¶æ Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Hena International Ltd. Sales Closer / Deal Closer / Sales Specialist / Lead Conversion Specialist (Digital Marketing) Application Deadline : 09 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 5 Location: Bangladesh, Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Published: 28 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements 3‚Äì4 years of experience in sales, preferably in digital marketing, IT services, or related industries. Proven experience in sales, lead conversion, or client relationship management. Excellent communication and negotiation skills. Ability to understand client needs and provide tailored solutions. Target-driven with strong result orientation. Familiarity with CRM or sales tracking systems is a plus. Responsibilities & Context Job Context Hena Technology, a leading digital marketing service provider in Bangladesh, is seeking a results-driven Sales Closer / Deal Closer / Sales Specialist / Lead Conversion Specialist. The role focuses on converting incoming leads into paying clients by understanding client needs, preparing tailored proposals, sending quotations, and ensuring professional customer service while achieving sales targets. Key Responsibilities: Communicate with potential clients and follow up effectively on all inbound leads. Convert incoming leads into confirmed/paid clients efficiently. Understand client requirements and prepare suitable service/product proposals. Send customized proposals and quotations to close deals. Achieve assigned sales targets consistently. Record all client interactions in CRM or sales tracking systems.
